name: ibis Chiang Mai Nimman Journeyhub
address: 7-17 Moo 2, Huay Kaew Road Chang Phueak, Muang, Chiang Mai 50300
description: Ibis Chiang Mai Nimman Journeyhub is perfectly located at the foothills of Doi Suthep, in the trendy Nimman area where guests can discover nightlife, walking street and shopping for local handicrafts within walking distance and near Chiang Mai University. With contemporary design, hotel has 142 guest rooms with free high-speed Wi-Fi, 24 hours dining serving a range of international favorites, a musical ambiance BAR to unwind, an Open-air swimming pool overlooking the hills and a 24-hour gym.accorhotels.com

name: Baan Suan Residence
address: 78/1 Moo3, 700th Anniversary Rd., Muang, Chiang Mai, Chiang Mai 50300
description: Located in Chiang Mai, Baan Suan Residence เฮือนพักบ้านสวน offers an outdoor pool and bicycle rental. It provides rooms and villas with free WiFi. The property also has a library. Surrounded by nature, all villas and rooms come with a balcony, refrigerator and cable flat-screen TV. Bathrooms are fitted with a bathtub. Some villas have a private pool. For guests’ convenience, the property provides laundry and daily maid service. Free shuttle services for the city centre and airport are available. Guests can enjoy Thai dishes at the restaurant. Room service can be arranged upon request. The city centre is 8 km away, while Chiang Mai International Airport is a 20-minute drive from the property.

name: Proud Phu Fah Muang Chiang Mai
address: 238/10 Moo 1 Kai Luk Sua Road Chang Phueak Subdistrict, Chiang Mai 50300

name: Treevana Club Chiangmai
address: 47 Viang Bua Road Chang Phuak, Chiang Mai 50300
description: Set within landscaped grounds, Treevana Club Chiangmai offers charming rooms with white furnishings. A 10-minute drive from Nimmanhemin Road, it features a restaurant, 24-hour reception, and free Wi-Fi. The air-conditioned rooms come with cable TV and a fridge with 2 free bottled waters. Each room has a private bathroom with toiletries and shower facilities. Treevana Club Chiangmai is a 20-minute drive from Chiang Mai International Airport. Kad Suan Kaew Central Department Store is 5 minutes’ drive away. A range of local restaurants are located within 200 metre of the property. Guest can enjoy free coffee and tea at the the dining area. The resort offers car rental, as well as laundry and ironing services.

name: Pha Thai House
description: Peacefully located in the heart of Chiang Mai old town, Pha Thai House offers an accommodation with gardens and an outdoor swimming pool. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. It is a 5-minute walk from Chiang Mai Gate and a night market. Featuring wooden flooring and furnishings, the air conditioned rooms come with a refrigerator and a desk. Certain rooms has a balcony and safe deposit box. En suite bathrooms include a hot and cold shower. Each room also has a seating area and refrigerator. Free bottled water is provided daily. For relaxation, massage services and spa facilities are available. There is also free public parking for guests. Local restaurants can be found nearby the property. Pha Thai House is a 7-minute walk from Wat Phra Singh Temple, while Chedi Luang Temple is a 10-minute walk away. Warorot Market is a 15-minute walk away. It is a 20-minute drive to Chiang Mai International Airport.

name: La Villetta Chiang Mai
address: 544/1 Koh Klang Road, Soi 1, Chiang Mai 50200
description: Set in a prime location of Chiang Mai, La Villetta Chiang Mai puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the hotel provides all you need for a good night's sleep. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, taxi service, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find television LCD/plasma screen, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning. Take a break from a long day and make use of outdoor pool, garden. For reliable service and professional staff, La Villetta Chiang Mai caters to your needs.Agoda

name: Baan Chai Thung Resort
description: Located in the beautiful Doi Saket of Chiang Mai, Baan Chai Thung Resort offers spacious villas with free Wi-Fi in the middle of peaceful surroundings. Guests can take a dip in an outdoor swimming pool or relax with massage services. Baan Chai Thung Resort is a 1 hr drive to Doi Suthep, the city’s most famous landmark. It is a 20-minute drive to the city centre and a 30-minute drive from Chiang Mai International Airport. Fitted with dark tone wooden interiors, the villas are adorned with modern and traditional-inspired decorations. Each air-conditioned villa is equipped with a private balcony, a TV and a refrigerator. Shower facilities are included in an en suite bathroom. The hotel features a large garden where guests can roam around and feel the fresh air of Chiang Mai. A chargeable airport shuttle is available upon request. Baan Chai Thung specialises in Thai and European cuisines. The hotel’s bar also serves light snacks and beverages.

name: Four Seasons Resort Chiang Mai
address: 502 Moo 1, Mae Rim-Samoeng Old Road, Chiang Mai 50180
description: Four Seasons Resort Chiang Mai overlooks rice fields and mountains in Mae Rim Valley. It features luxurious bungalows with outdoor living spaces. A spa and outdoor swimming pool is available. Four Seasons Chiang Mai offers bungalows decorated with original paintings and Siamese art pieces. It has polished teak floors and rich Thai cotton fabrics. Private bathrooms overlook the garden and feature a separate dressing area. The resort features a well-equipped fitness centre. Guests can also make use of the tennis court or head for a soothing massage. Free bicycle rentals are provided. Other facilities include yoga and cooking classes and babysitting service, which are available with an additional cost. Guests can dine al fresco on the home-style Italian cusine at the open-air Terraces Restaurant while enjoying views of the surrounding rice paddies and distant Doi Suthep. For a more relaxed afternoon and evening, head over to the Ratree Bar and Lounge to enjoy fine wines and signature cocktails. Private dining experiences and a 24-hour room service are also available. Four Seasons offers free shuttle service from Chiang Mai City, which is approximately a 1-hour drive away.

name: Kodchasri Thani Hotel Chiangmai
description: Offering 4-star boutique accommodation in the Old City of Chiang Mai, Kodchasri Thani Hotel is a 10-minute walk from the Night Bazaar. An outdoor pool, free Wi-Fi and free bicycle rentals are available. Traditional Thai decor, Oriental wooden furnishings and unique curved built-in wardrobe give rooms an elegant feel. Rooms also come with a flat-screen TV and minibar. All rooms are equipped with an ionic air purifier. Guests enjoy daily turn down service and herbal tea. Kodchasri Thani Hotel is a 10-minute drive from Chiang Mai International Airport. A 5-10 minute walk will take guests to various attractions like Wat Chedi Luang, Wat Phan On and the Three Kings Monument. It also includes Saturday & Sunday Walking Street and Thapae Gate. Guests can exercise at the fitness centre or spend time at the special pet play area. Sightseeing tours can be arranged at the tour desk. Authentic Thai dishes, as well as Western cuisine, are served at the hotel’s restaurant. In-room dining is available with room service.
